message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $170 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $120?
